# toadlester Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Configure the Toadlester provider
provider "toadlester" {
  base_url = "http://localhost:8899"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `base_url` (String) URL to access the Toadlester API
